MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area and we apologise for this. Our team are still working on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:05pm on Saturday, 12 December 2020
